div.head: Stahl and Schenker
div.p: Schenker quotes in his diary from an article by Stahl in the Berliner Tageblatt for November 21, 1911. In his diary for August 24, 1914 he expresses his agreement with an article entitled "Deutsche Form" in the Berliner Tageblatt (August 19, 1914, morning edition, p. [2]), in which Stahl talks of Germany's debt to its geniuses, especially as these are manifested in the German soldiers fighting in World War I. This article may have influenced Schenker's own unpublished article "Deutsche Genie," which he began writing on August 30, 1914.
